This week, GitHub Copilot brings you a new interactive experience with chat in Visual Studio, several updates to the chat experience in Visual Studio Code, and the arrival of an expanded context window. Stay in the flow with Interactive Code Assistant View in Visual Studio With the Interactive Code Assistant view, you can now refine […]
